post: BRI is excited to announce our newest affiliate partnership with History By Mail. History By Mail is a monthly subscription service for reproductions of historical letters and documents. "My goal as a history teacher has always been to help students make meaningful connections to the past, to each other, and to the ideas that shape our world," says Elizabeth Summerlin, a Gary Colletti Conference Scholarship recipient and teacher at Mill Creek High School, GA. With support from the Bill of Rights Institute, Elizabeth attended the National Council for the Social Studies conference for the first time. From insights on leadership to sessions on grassroots movements and civic simulations, she gained invaluable tools to bring history to life for her students. Elizabeth shared, "BRIs dedication to civic education aligns perfectly with my classroom goals, helping students build connections that will shape their future."
